description: Try our easy to follow White Christmas Fudge recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fudge,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,White Christmas,Egg free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Microwave,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: White Christmas Fudge Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a 20x20cm square baking pan with baking paper. Set aside.
Place chocolate and condensed milk into a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave for approximately three minutes, stirring after each minute, or until melted.
Stir pistachios and cranberries through mixture, reserving half to sprinkle on top.
Pour into prepared pan and sprinkle with reserved pistachios and cranberries. Refrigerate for two hours before cutting into squares to serve.
